page.title: 02HOUSING AT BURLEY WOODHEAD
page.content: Our job in the Domesday project was to study the houses in{Burley Woodhead We discovered that most of the houses were at least 100 years old and were at one time mills, warehouses, mill workers' cottages etc. They are all with only one or two exceptions,made of stone with stone slab roofs. Most of the windows and doors have been replaced but even so,each house has its own personal,characteristic features. Some of the buildings have either been rebuilt,using the original stone or converted into family homes but this has been done in such a way that none of the houses and cottages look out of place in the beautiful, countryside surroundings. All in all,Burley Woodhead is a very pleasant place to live.
